means: 投手为使打击手打空而投的缓慢球

sentence.Network_en: We were late for the party and I had to change up.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们去晚会就要迟到了,所以我不得不加快了车速.

sentence.Network_en: This kind of state does not have fundamental change up to now.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种状况至今没有根本改变.

sentence.Network_en: Change - up: A pitch thrown deceptively slowly to surprise the batter.
sentence.Network_cn: 变线球: 用虚假慢动作投球,奇袭击球员.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 变速球(change-up):出手时跟球进垒时的时速差超过10英里,迷惑打者的挥击时机掌心球(palm ball):会投出变速球的效果,球会小角度漂移.
